summary: This bill, the Foreign Agricultural Restrictions to Maintain Local Agriculture and National Defense Act of 2025 (FARMLAND Act of 2025), aims to strengthen oversight over foreign investment in the U.S. agricultural industry. It amends the Agricultural Foreign Investment Disclosure Act of 1978, increasing penalties, mandating due diligence, requiring reports on foreign land purchases, and prohibiting foreign entities of concern from participating in Farm Service Agency programs. The bill also authorizes funds for enforcement and database development related to foreign land ownership.
